data.title: Pure Wax - Waxing, Laser Hair Removal, Facials
data.meta_description: Pure Wax has a history of providing high-quality waxing, laser hair removal, and facials in London. Visit our locations in Soho and Farringdon. Book today.
data.text:
“

I’ve been here about twice and already and I’m still impressed with the service! Mia is such a kind soul, from the start to the end. We spoke about many things and she instantly made me feel comfortable. She’s also very qualified as she told me how often I need to wax and it was such an amazing experience. I am definitely coming back here again!!! Thank you Mia, you’re amazing.

Melanie R.Google review

“

The most welcoming and friendly experience! The salon very clean and beautifully designed, Adelina and Tanya are very professional and made me feel as comfortable and at ease during my waxing. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a full body wax. I will definitely be back soon! Thank you xxx

RanjitaGoogle review

“

Seamless booking process for male waxing treatment. Highly professional staff and the service provided by Julia was exceptional - comfortable and pain-free treatment, coupled with an excellent attitude and great personality. I will return. Thank you.

Chris O.Google review

“

I’ve been a regular since this place opened. Lovely, clean, stylish decor. Each room is well furnished. Clean toilet. Friendly staff and receptionist. Amazing wax, (almost) painless. The hot wax used is also high quality, you will notice the difference. Fran is amazing but always booked up (for good reason!). All the aestheticians here seem excellent.

Tasnima K.Google review

“

Went for waxing appointment. Great service, was really impressed. First time I have been to Pure Wax, have used the same beautician for 10 years so I was a bit worried. Perfect results, clean, friendly. Adelina is lovely. I will be back. Definitely recommend.

K. BrownGoogle review

“

A quick but highly skilled treatment. It was absolutely what I wanted.

DianaTreatwell review

“

Fantastic facial wax! Justina was so friendly, professional and with great attention to detail! Looking forward to my next visit. Thank you.

MeganTreatwell review

“

I was so impressed with this treatment. I’m a nervous client and Justina really put me at ease. She was also very thorough and insisted on making sure it was perfect. This got great results and I am very happy with the quality of the wax, easily the neatest I’ve ever had and very good value for money. Thank you Justina!

JessicaTreatwell review

“

Simply amazing service. The most pain-free waxing I ever had, professional and friendly atmosphere. Adelina did an amazing job.

MariyaTreatwell review

“

Fran was incredible - couldn't rate her high enough! Made me feel so comfortable and did a fantastic job. The salon was clean, air-conditioned & had relaxing music playing. I will 100% be going back here.

ClaireTreatwell review
